

# Patient baseline characteristics
## over quartiles of `r sapply( JSON$Characteristics$Groups , with , Label )[n.P]`


```{r,PCgetAllVars,include=FALSE}
# n.P <- 1 ; n.M <- 1 ; n.Surv <- 1
opts_chunk$set(warnings=FALSE,echo=FALSE,errors=FALSE)

Table1Vars   <- c(Ms,As,PMs)
Table1Types  <- sapply(c(JSON$Survival$Modifiers,JSON$Survival$Adjustments,JSON$Characteristics$Measures) , with , Type )
Table1Labels <- sapply(c(JSON$Survival$Modifiers,JSON$Survival$Adjustments,JSON$Characteristics$Measures) , with , Label )


``` 



## Proportions

```{r,LaTeXproportions,results='as.is'}

Table1Proportions <- matrix(
    unlist(
        lapply(
            X = paste( Table1Vars[which(Table1Types == "factor")] ) ,
            FUN = ProportionsOverGroups ,
            groups = paste("cP" , n.P-1 , sep = "" ))
        ) ,
    ncol = 9 ,
    byrow = TRUE
)


htmlTable(
          Table1Proportions,
          header =  c("%","N","%","N","%","N","%","N","P"),
          rnames = Table1Labels[which(Table1Types == "factor")] ,
          cgroup = c("Q1","Q2","Q3","Q4",""),
          n.cgroup = c(2,2,2,2,1), 
          caption = paste(
                          "Patient characteristics over" ,
                          "quartiles of" ,
                          Predictors[n.P] ,
                          "for categorical variables reported as proportions (counts)." ,
                          "Trends over quartiles" ,
                          "where estimated with a logistic regression model.") ,
          tfoot="")

``` 
    

    

## Means    

```{r,LaTeXMeans}

Table1Means <- matrix(
    unlist(
        lapply(
            X = paste( Table1Vars[which(Table1Types == "numeric")] ) ,
            FUN = MeansOverGroups ,
            groups = paste("cP" , n.P-1 , sep = "" ))
        ) ,
    ncol = 9 ,
    byrow = TRUE
)

htmlTable(
          Table1Means ,
          header =  c( "Mean","SE","Mean","SE","Mean","SE","Mean","SE","P" ),
          rnames = Table1Labels[which(Table1Types == "numeric")] ,
          cgroup = c("Q1","Q2","Q3","Q4",""),
          n.cgroup = c(2,2,2,2,1), 
          caption = paste("Patient characteristics over" , Predictors[n.P] , "quartiles for continuous variables reported as mean (standard error). Standard errors and p for trend over quartiles were estimated with general linear models.") ,
          tfoot="")


```
